review: Received right on time! So easy to install to the back of my tv's. Took me all of ten minutes.  Price is amazing for what you get!
author: Andy

review: It looks really nice in the box! Connected in my apartment it doesn't work only 20 feet away from my wireless internet router.  Very disappointed so far with this product.  Apparently I have to buy something to amplify the wireless internet signal despite the fact that all my other devices do fine anywhere in the apartment and even outside!  Not happy!
author: Roberto Barrera

review: Easy to use.  Highly recommend for viewing Prime movies.
author: chalkdust

review: Awesome device and easy to install.  Would definitely recommend.
author: pauline felizardo

review: LOVE!  Super easy to set up and way better than my smart blu-ray player.  Impressed with how seamless it is to use and the iPhone app is freaking perfect!!  BRAVO Amazon! :) very impressed!
author: Julia  Kennison

review: Absolutely love it! Amazed by the choices of games and TV that is offered in this tiny device.
author: Chris Harkins

review: Fantastic and functional...I'm completely addicted with the Fire TV Stick and plan to order more as gifts!  Easy to use and easy to set up.
author: Amazon Customer "Baylor Girl"

review: Easy to install and use.  Works very well.
author: Laurent

review: It would have gotten 5 stars if it had Youtube!
author: Amackey
